statements: SELECT * FROM language_resources LIMIT 5;
SELECT resource_name, language FROM language_resources WHERE language='English';
SELECT resource_name, language, level_of_proficiency FROM language_resources ORDER BY level_of_proficiency DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM language_resources WHERE is_public=true;
SELECT * FROM language_resources WHERE language='Spanish' AND level_of_proficiency='Advanced';
SELECT * FROM language_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' AND language = 'English';
SELECT resource_name, language FROM language_resources WHERE level_of_proficiency = 'Advanced' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, level_of_proficiency, is_public FROM language_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND is_public = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM language_resources WHERE language = 'Spanish' ORDER BY level_of_proficiency ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT resource_name, level_of_proficiency FROM language_resources WHERE is_public = FALSE AND language IN ('French', 'German') ORDER BY level_of_proficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_resources;
SELECT resource_name, language FROM language_resources WHERE resource_type='book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM study_materials WHERE language='English';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, language FROM language_resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, language FROM study_materials WHERE language='Spanish' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_resources WHERE language='English';
SELECT resource_name, language FROM language_resources WHERE resource_type='Book';
SELECT language, COUNT(*) FROM study_materials GROUP BY language;
SELECT material_name FROM study_materials WHERE language='French' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, material_name FROM language_resources INNER JOIN study_materials ON language_resources.id = study_materials.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM LanguageResources WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM LanguageResources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudyMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND language = 'Spanish';
SELECT material_name, material_link FROM StudyMaterials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE language = 'French' ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT id, resource_name, language FROM LanguageResources WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM StudyMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM LanguageResources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND language = 'Spanish';
SELECT language, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM LanguageResources GROUP BY language HAVING total_count > 3;
SELECT user_id, language, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE language = 'French' ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE subscribed_language_id = 1;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE subscribed_language_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE subscribed_language_id IN (SELECT language_id FROM languages WHERE proficiency_level = 'Advanced');
SELECT user_id, user_name, language_name, proficiency_level FROM users JOIN languages ON users.subscribed_language_id = languages.language_id WHERE users.user_id = 3;
SELECT u.user_name, l.language_name, l.proficiency_level FROM users u, languages l WHERE u.subscribed_language_id = l.language_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM LanguageResources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, date_added FROM LanguageResources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM StudyMaterials WHERE date_added > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT user_id, resource_id FROM UserResources WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT category_name, description FROM LanguageCategories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM LanguageResources WHERE resource_type='audio';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM LanguageResources WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, r.resource_id, r.resource_name FROM Users u JOIN UserResources ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN LanguageResources r ON ur.resource_id = r.resource_id WHERE u.country='USA';
SELECT r.resource_name, c.category_name FROM LanguageResources r JOIN LanguageCategories c ON r.resource_id = c.category_id WHERE c.description LIKE '%beginner%';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_resources FROM LanguageResources;
